name: Welcome to the Typing Zone: An Educational Typing Game for All Ages
name_original: Welcome to the Typing Zone: An Educational Typing Game for All Ages
description:
Learn or review your touch-typing skills in this little retro-style typing game!

If you get any misspelled words in the play level or any bugs, please let me know! 

Credits Links: 

  • background music: Telluric Undercurrent by Revolution Void
  • main font: Wellbutrin
  • secondary font: Varela Round
  • keyboard: RetryEli’s 1-Bit Keyboard Assets
  • speech bubble: EDslashEM’s RPG Pixel Art Assets 2
  • typing sound: Yottasound's Computer Keyboard Single Key Type 2
  • error sound: Breviceps' 8-Bit - Error sound
  • LCD Screen texture from textures4photoshop
